name: Chickens & Moles
description:
Made for GMC Jam 7, where the theme was "Two Worlds" and the handicap was "Must include a cutscene". It came 1st.

Farmer Grumble is having a rotten time trying to have an afternoon snooze. The chickens are clucking and the moles are digging. Enraged, the farmer locks the animals away in cages.

Move cogs, drop rock-hard eggs and cut ropes to rescue the animals.
